summary: After survivng his own execution, Tenshu choses to be subjected to the bizarre experiments of the prison officials.
cast: Hideo Sakaki|Ryô|Koyuki|Shun Sugata|Erika Oda|Tak Sakaguchi|Jun Kunimura|Ryûshi Mizukami|Keita Kimura|Minoru Aoki|Yoji Tanaka|Takanori Hamachika|Makato Kitami|Seki Watanabe|Suenari Matsubara|Masataka Takahashi|Kifofumi Takahashi|Ayumi Yoshihara|Hibiki Izawa|Yukihito Tanikado|Jun'ichi Kubozono|Naonobu Shibata|Minoru Matsumoto|Yuichiro Arai|Kazuhito Ohba|Takehiro Katayama|Motonari Komiya|Hiroyuki Yoshida|Toshinari Horiuchi|Taro Kanazawa|Ryuji Gotoh|Gô Ohara|Toyoshi Sawada|Masami Kobayashi|Kenji Matsuda|Renji Ishibashi|Hitoshi Ozawa|Shunsuke Matsuoka|Tate Gouta|Bengal|Tetta Sugimoto
title: Alive
